<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete CIDR</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/allow_list/network/{networkUuid}/cidr/{cidrUuid}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Deletes an existing CIDR block.
